payload.content: The peak of the Witch Trials occurred simultaneously with the rise of Modern Philosophy.

name: The peak of the Witch Trials occurred simultaneously with the rise of Modern Phi
content: The peak of the Witch Trials occurred simultaneously with the rise of Modern Philosophy.

payload.content: To understand the relationship between early modern philosophy and the supernatural, one should explore how major philosophers like Agrippa, Descartes, Hobbes, and Spinoza reasoned about witchcraft and demonology during the Witch Trials.

name: To understand the relationship between early modern philosophy and the supernatu
content: To understand the relationship between early modern philosophy and the supernatural, one should explore how major philosophers like Agrippa, Descartes, Hobbes, and Spinoza reasoned about witchcraft and demonology during the Witch Trials.
